𔒴 𔒱 𓇓 𓇑 𐤑 ṣad "plant" sadek 𐤑 ṣādē hunt/papyrus ṣ [sˤ] צץ ܨ ص, ض 𐩮 ጸ, ጰ, ፀ (Ϻϻ) — Цц, Чч, Џџ ⇔ seed

𓎛 𓆰 𓈖 tṛ́ṇa तृण “grass” tь̃rnъ thorn ⇔ 𓇮 Dorn 𓎛 drehn

cannabis ( Hanf hemp) 𒃻 κάνναβος 𒋆𒄣𒌦𒈾𒁍 qunnapu ܩܢܦܐ qnpʾ قِنَّب qinnab կանեփ kanepʿ kenevir भाङ्ग (bhāṅga) بنگ (bang), the "reverse" forms of it (due to a taboo)

The ‘bis’ in Cannabis may be related to phyth(plant) bush пыш (pyš, “hemp” or the
duplication doublet bis 2, and to distinguish cannabis flowers and leaves from cane, the stem gan 干 gene , 树干 shùgàn ก้าน gâan!
